alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Eastern Pondera; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 03 at 3:08AM MDT until April 06 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts mostly up to 70 mph possible, but gusts of up to 80 mph will be possible close to the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front, including all of Glacier and Pondera Counties, and Toole. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow may also cause periods of near whiteout conditions at and above mountain pass level.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
